roles: AI Centre of Enablement (AICOE) leader / architect

major_initiatives_and_projects_overview.name: EVA – ESDC’s Virtual Assistant Platform
major_initiatives_and_projects_overview.summary: Core GenAI/RAG platform in Azure, acting as a faceless AI brain with reusable APIs for many applications.

major_initiatives_and_projects_overview.name: EVA Chat
major_initiatives_and_projects_overview.summary: Enterprise GPT-4 assistant for ESDC employees, focused on safe productivity in a Protected B environment.

major_initiatives_and_projects_overview.name: EVA Domain Assistant (EVA DA 2.0)
major_initiatives_and_projects_overview.summary: RAG UI and project-based assistant framework with strong accessibility and bilingual support.

major_initiatives_and_projects_overview.name: AssistMe Migration to EVA / BDM KM
major_initiatives_and_projects_overview.summary: Refactor AssistMe as a client of EVA’s RAG services and IIAID pipeline, avoiding lift-and-shift.

major_initiatives_and_projects_overview.name: AI Governance & Software Approval Framework
major_initiatives_and_projects_overview.summary: Risk-based, accountable-access framework for AI and software tools at ESDC.

major_initiatives_and_projects_overview.name: AI Awareness & Literacy Campaign
major_initiatives_and_projects_overview.summary: Multi-week and year-long campaign to raise AI literacy and responsible use across ESDC.

major_initiatives_and_projects_overview.name: IITB AI Retooling Program
